name: Final Freedom
description:
Final Freedom.

A Game By Fatal Exit (Cillian Clifford)

My entry for the first Sloyd Jam

Made solo in less than 72 hours.

Sloyd Assets used:

  • Fireplace
  • Altars: 4 variants
  • Candles x2 (1 equipable)
  • Doors
  • Hammer (equipable)
  • Gongs
  • Potion Bottle
  • Round Table
  • Suitcase
  • Stairs
  • Street Lights 2x
  • Tombstones 2x

Software used:

  • Sloyd
  • Unity
  • Affinity Designer
  • FL Studio
  • Replica Studios
  • Synthesizer V Pro
  • Synth V Solaria

Asset Credits:

  • Catsoft Studios Game Creator 2
  • Inventory & Dialogue for GC 2
  • Synty Studios Mini Fantasy Characters
  • Flat Kit
  • Basic Motions/Crafting Animations
  • Broken Vector Low Poly Storage

Shoutouts to the awesome Sloyd Staff

And to the Sloyd Community

I couldn't have done this without you.
